title.en: The Seven Preliminaries for Purifying the Mind

text.en: To all the buddhas, the lions of the human race,
text.en-trans: jinyé su dak chok chü jikten na

text.en: In all directions of the universe, through past and present and future:
text.en-trans: dü sum shekpa mi yi sengé kün

text.en: To every single one of you, I bow in homage;
text.en-trans: dak gi malü dedak tamché la

text.en: Devotion fills my body, speech and mind.
text.en-trans: lü dang ngak yi dangwé chak gyi o

text.en: Through the power of this prayer, aspiring to Good Action,
text.en-trans: zangpo chöpé mönlam tob dak gi

text.en: All the victorious ones appear, vivid here before my mind
text.en-trans: gyalwa tamché yi kyi ngönsum du

text.en: And I multiply my body as many times as atoms in the universe,
text.en-trans: zhing gi dul nyé lü rab tüpa yi

text.en: Each one bowing in prostration to all the buddhas.
text.en-trans: gyalwa kün la rabtu chaktsal lo

text.en: In every atom preside as many buddhas as there are atoms,
text.en-trans: dul chik teng na dul nyé sangye nam

text.en: And around them, all their bodhisattva heirs:
text.en-trans: sangye sé kyi ü na zhukpa dak

text.en: And so I imagine them filling
text.en-trans: detar chö kyi ying nam malüpa

text.en: Completely the entire space of reality.
text.en-trans: tamché gyalwa dak gi gangwar mö

text.en: Saluting them with an endless ocean of praise,
text.en-trans: dedak ngakpa mizé gyatso nam

text.en: With the sounds of an ocean of different melodies
text.en-trans: yang kyi yenlak gyatsö dra kün gyi

text.en: I sing of the buddhas’ noble qualities,
text.en-trans: gyalwa kün gyi yönten rab jö ching

text.en: And praise all those who have gone to perfect bliss.
text.en-trans: dewar shekpa tamché dak gi tö

text.en: To every buddha, I make offerings:
text.en-trans: metok dampa trengwa dampa dang

text.en: Of the loveliest flowers, of beautiful garlands,
text.en-trans: silnyen nam dang jukpa duk chok dang

text.en: Of music and perfumed ointments, the best of parasols,
text.en-trans: marmé chok dang dukpö dampa yi

text.en: The brightest lamps and finest incense.
text.en-trans: gyalwa dedak la ni chöpar gyi

text.en: To every buddha, I make offerings:
text.en-trans: naza dampa nam dang dri chok dang

text.en: Exquisite garments and the most fragrant scents,
text.en-trans: chema purma rirab nyampa dang

text.en: Powdered incense, heaped as high as Mount Meru,
text.en-trans: köpa khyepar pakpé chok kün gyi

text.en: Arranged in perfect symmetry.
text.en-trans: gyalwa dedak la ni chöpar gyi

text.en: Then the vast and unsurpassable offerings—
text.en-trans: chöpa gang nam lamé gya chewa

text.en: Inspired by my devotion to all the buddhas, and
text.en-trans: dedak gyalwa tamché la yang mö

text.en: Moved by the power of my faith in Good Actions—
text.en-trans: zangpo chö la depé tob dak gi

text.en: I prostrate and offer to all you victorious ones.
text.en-trans: gyalwa kün la chaktsal chöpar gyi

text.en: Whatever negative acts I have committed,
text.en-trans: döchak zhedang timuk wang gi ni

text.en: While driven by desire, hatred and ignorance,
text.en-trans: lü dang ngak dang dezhin yi kyi kyang

text.en: With my body, my speech and also with my mind,
text.en-trans: dikpa dak gi gyipa chi chipa

text.en: Before you, I confess and purify each and every one.
text.en-trans: dedak tamché dak gi sosor shak

text.en: With a heart full of delight, I rejoice at all the merits
text.en-trans: chok chü gyalwa kün dang sangye sé

text.en: Of buddhas and bodhisattvas,
text.en-trans: ranggyal nam dang lob dang mi lob dang

text.en: Pratyekabuddhas, those in training and the arhats beyond training,
text.en-trans: drowa kün gyi sönam gangla yang

text.en: And every living being, throughout the entire universe.
text.en-trans: dedak kün gyi jesu dak yi rang

text.en: You who are like beacons of light shining through the worlds,
text.en-trans: gang nam chok chü jikten drönma nam

text.en: Who passed through the stages of enlightenment, to attain buddhahood, freedom from all attachment,
text.en-trans: changchub rimpar sangye machak nyé

text.en: I exhort you: all of you protectors,
text.en-trans: gönpo dedak dak gi tamché la

text.en: Turn the unsurpassable wheel of Dharma.
text.en-trans: khorlo lanamepar korwar kul

text.en: Joining my palms together, I pray
text.en-trans: nya ngen da tön gang zhé dedak la

text.en: To you who intend to pass into nirvāṇa,
text.en-trans: drowa kün la pen zhing dewé chir

text.en: Remain, for aeons as many as the atoms in this world,
text.en-trans: kalpa zhing gi dul nyé zhukpar yang

text.en: And bring well-being and happiness to all living beings.
text.en-trans: dak gi talmo rab jar solwar gyi

text.en: What little virtue I have gathered through my homage,
text.en-trans: chaktsalwa dang chö ching shakpa dang

text.en: Through offering, confession, and rejoicing,
text.en-trans: jesu yi rang kul zhing solwa yi

text.en: Through exhortation and prayer—all of it
text.en-trans: gewa chungzé dak gi chi sakpa

text.en: I dedicate to the enlightenment of all beings!
text.en-trans: tamché dak gi changchub chir ngo o
